Hypenotic The Jekyll Butler

Unsuck It

16 Aug 2010

Of course it sucks that this needs to exist. And I know it’s a joke, but it does. Until people learn to stop writing copy that says “we” instead of “you”, and until people stop using twitter to have private conversations publicly, we need reminders that the era of talking at people is over.

Jargon doesn’t make you more credible, it makes you more suspect.

Unsuck It.
